NewsArticle.Title: Ball King and Queen
NewsArticle.Content: Preparations for the Oren Ball have begun. To become a Ball King or Queen, Aislings must participate in a Scavenger Hunt inside the Oren Throne. To obtain an item, conversate with the mundanes at the Ball. The first to obtain all of the items will become Ball King or Queen. Only one couple can become the Ball King and Queen. Formal clothing will be available tomorrow morning ((9 am pst)).
